Variables and Data Types

Variables are containers for storing data values.

Example: 

name = "Alice"
age = 25
height = 5.6
is_student = True

print(name)
print(age)
print(height)
print(is_student)

Data Types:

  • String: Text data (e.g., "Hello")
  • Integer: Whole numbers (e.g., 42)
  • Float: Decimal numbers (e.g., 3.14)
  • Boolean: True or False
